> x2 = c(582,132,716,515,158,80,757,529,335,497,3369,746,201,277,593,361,905,1513,744,507,622,347,244,116,463,453,751,540,1950,520,179,624,448,844,1233,176,308,299,531,71,717)
> data1 = data.frame(x1,x2)
> attach(data1)

    x1, x2
